data.text: Runrun, runruru～n♪ ―Ah
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed: <story>Runrun, runruru～n♪ ―Ah

data.text:
On a day off, I was heading out to go shopping 
when I bumped in to Smart Falcon.
data.processed:
<story>On a day off, I was heading out to go shopping 
<story>when I bumped in to Smart Falcon.

data.text:
Trainer-san, are you heading out too? 
You see, Falco's heading out to go gather some 『Input』♪
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, are you heading out too? 
<story>You see, Falco's heading out to go gather some 『Input』♪

data.text:
Obviously, 
the kind to help become a sparkly, cute top Umadol!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Obviously, 
<story>the kind to help become a sparkly, cute top Umadol!

data.text:
It's something I heard from a popular idol recently. 
『The reason I'm the way I am, is because of lots of Input!』
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>It's something I heard from a popular idol recently. 
<story>『The reason I'm the way I am, is because of lots of Input!』

data.text:
That's why Falco has to do some studying! 
With a full tank, full steam ahead, until the very end!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>That's why Falco has to do some studying! 
<story>With a full tank, full steam ahead, until the very end!

data.text: ……for some reason, I'm really worried.
data.processed: <story>……for some reason, I'm really worried.

data.text:
Ehh…… really!? 
In that case, I'd like to get lots of advice☆
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Ehh…… really!? 
<story>In that case, I'd like to get lots of advice☆

data.text: First, we went to the movies and saw a musical.
data.processed: <story>First, we went to the movies and saw a musical.

data.text:
Ughh…… that last scene was so good. 
To think that the bartender was actually a descendant of Mozart……
data.name: Smart Falcon

choices.text: The singing and dancing was good too
choices.processed: <size=43>The singing and dancing was good too</size>

choices.text: The singing and dancing was good too
choices.processed: <size=43>The singing and dancing was good too</size>

data.processed:
<story>Ughh…… that last scene was so good. 
<story>To think that the bartender was actually a descendant of Mozart……

data.text:
Yeah, it felt so authentic, didn't it!? It's a different 
direction from an Umadol, but it was still wonderful～♪
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, it felt so authentic, didn't it!? It's a different 
<story>direction from an Umadol, but it was still wonderful～♪

data.text: Next we visited a popular theme park to see a parade.
data.processed: <story>Next we visited a popular theme park to see a parade.

data.text:
Waaah! Look at that character! 
Even though they're so round, they can still move so sharply!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Waaah! Look at that character! 
<story>Even though they're so round, they can still move so sharply!

data.text:
Yeah! It's something you couldn't do unless you practiced 
everyday until your body did it naturally!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Yeah! It's something you couldn't do unless you practiced 
<story>everyday until your body did it naturally!

data.text:
Alllright, time to practice so Falco can do 10 
consecutive backflips while wearing any outfit～～!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Alllright, time to practice so Falco can do 10 
<story>consecutive backflips while wearing any outfit～～!

data.text:
While walking down the street, 
we encountered a group doing freestyle rap battles.
data.processed:
<story>While walking down the street, 
<story>we encountered a group doing freestyle rap battles.

data.text:
Hyaaaa～! It's a rap battle……! It's the first time I've seen one 
in person…… i-it's really imposing!!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Hyaaaa～! It's a rap battle……! It's the first time I've seen one 
<story>in person…… i-it's really imposing!!

data.text:
It's like the clashing of two personas, wouldn't 
you say!? For an Umadol, a persona is a must 
but, I don't think mine is as striking……
data.name: Smart Falcon

choices.text: You don't need to be like a rapper

data.processed:
<story>It's like the clashing of two personas, wouldn't 
<story>you say!? For an Umadol, a persona is a must 
<story>but, I don't think mine is as striking……

data.text:
But but, I think it's better to have a defined persona! 
It's easier to find your audience that way!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>But but, I think it's better to have a defined persona! 
<story>It's easier to find your audience that way!

data.text:
So Falco will refine my persona! To the point I can win a rap 
battle, I'll develop a striking and unique persona……!!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>So Falco will refine my persona! To the point I can win a rap 
<story>battle, I'll develop a striking and unique persona……!!

data.text: I got the feeling things were heading in the wrong direction……
data.processed: <story>I got the feeling things were heading in the wrong direction……

data.text:
When we passed by the station, we could hear the sound of intense 
drumming. But there weren't any drums in sight, just an 
empty-handed performer.
data.processed:
<story>When we passed by the station, we could hear the sound of intense 
<story>drumming. But there weren't any drums in sight, just an 
<story>empty-handed performer.

data.text: Waaah!? An air drummer!!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed: <story>Waaah!? An air drummer!!

data.text:
Amaaaazing!! They're handling the stick perfectly as 
they match the music coming from the speakers……!!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Amaaaazing!! They're handling the stick perfectly as 
<story>they match the music coming from the speakers……!!

data.text:
It almost seems like they really have a drum! To think you could 
express yourself so freely using only your body! Even though 
Falco can only sing and dance―
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>It almost seems like they really have a drum! To think you could 
<story>express yourself so freely using only your body! Even though 
<story>Falco can only sing and dance―

data.text:
……No, if I try, I might be able to do it too!! 
Air Drumming, or even an Air Band!!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>……No, if I try, I might be able to do it too!! 
<story>Air Drumming, or even an Air Band!!

data.text: ――We're heading completely off the rails here
data.processed: <story>――We're heading completely off the rails here

data.text:
At night, we arrived at a small park that was really popular. 
We could hear the sound of leaves rustling, and……
data.processed:
<story>At night, we arrived at a small park that was really popular. 
<story>We could hear the sound of leaves rustling, and……

data.text: Ah, ah, that's……!!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed: <story>Ah, ah, that's……!!

data.text:
If I recall―― right, a traveling monk! They travel to different 
places while playing their flute as training, right!?
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>If I recall―― right, a traveling monk! They travel to different 
<story>places while playing their flute as training, right!?

data.text:
Even if they're alone, they continue to play 
their flute……! So courageous! Such guts! They 
must really believe in their own path, huh!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Even if they're alone, they continue to play 
<story>their flute……! So courageous! Such guts! They 
<story>must really believe in their own path, huh!

data.text: I wonder if I've become like that yet……?
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed: <story>I wonder if I've become like that yet……?

data.text:
No, I haven't……! I haven't become a traveling monk yet……! 
Isn't that right, Trainer-san……!?
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>No, I haven't……! I haven't become a traveling monk yet……! 
<story>Isn't that right, Trainer-san……!?

data.text:
She had a desperate look on her face and her eyes seemed empty. 
Just like someone who had lost their way.

choices.text: You're wrong, snap out of it!
You're wrong, snap out of it!

data.processed:
<story>She had a desperate look on her face and her eyes seemed empty. 
<story>Just like someone who had lost their way.

data.text: ―Hyaauu!?
data.name: Smart Falcon

choices.text: What do you want to become?
What do you want to become?

data.processed: <story>―Hyaauu!?

data.text:
W-what is it that Falco wants to become……? 
That's, obviously―
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>W-what is it that Falco wants to become……? 
<story>That's, obviously―

data.text: ―Ah, that's right.
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed: <story>―Ah, that's right.

data.text:
……that's right. What Falco wants to be isn't 
a traveling monk, a rapper, or an air drummer.
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>……that's right. What Falco wants to be isn't 
<story>a traveling monk, a rapper, or an air drummer.

data.text: What I want to be…… is an Umadol.
data.name: Smart Falcon

choices.text: Input is just used as a reference
Input is just used as a reference

data.processed: <story>What I want to be…… is an Umadol.

data.text:
……Thank you, Trainer-san. 
I almost forgot the most important thing.
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>……Thank you, Trainer-san. 
<story>I almost forgot the most important thing.

data.text:
Ehehe, it was a good thing you came with me. 
If you hadn't, I'd probably be so confused right now.
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Ehehe, it was a good thing you came with me. 
<story>If you hadn't, I'd probably be so confused right now.

data.text:
Well, let's see…… for the movie it was the realistic performance, 
for the parade it was the pure skill.
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Well, let's see…… for the movie it was the realistic performance, 
<story>for the parade it was the pure skill.

data.text:
I was overwhelmed by the personas during the rap battles, and the 
intensity of the air drums was shocking. And the presence of 
being of the traveling monk.
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>I was overwhelmed by the personas during the rap battles, and the 
<story>intensity of the air drums was shocking. And the presence of 
<story>being of the traveling monk.

data.text:
But everyone was so dignified, doing their best 
to follow their own path. That's why…… ah!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>But everyone was so dignified, doing their best 
<story>to follow their own path. That's why…… ah!

data.text:
―Right! The thing that left the biggest impression 
was the sparkle in their eyes!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>―Right! The thing that left the biggest impression 
<story>was the sparkle in their eyes!

data.text:
For every performance, the performer and 
the audience, everyone's eyes were sparkling☆
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>For every performance, the performer and 
<story>the audience, everyone's eyes were sparkling☆

data.text:
Well, the only one watching the traveling monk was us though…… 
―but anyways!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Well, the only one watching the traveling monk was us though…… 
<story>―but anyways!

data.text:
The people doing the performing were all working hard and 
shining, and the people watching were basking in that, I think!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>The people doing the performing were all working hard and 
<story>shining, and the people watching were basking in that, I think!

data.text:
It's a reaaaaally wonderful thing, don't you think!? Falco too, 
it would be great if I could shine like that for someone too♪
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>It's a reaaaaally wonderful thing, don't you think!? Falco too, 
<story>it would be great if I could shine like that for someone too♪

data.text: And then, a few days later―
data.processed: <story>And then, a few days later―

data.text: Hey hey, Trainer-san, do you know about Fire Dances!?
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed: <story>Hey hey, Trainer-san, do you know about Fire Dances!?

data.text:
……It seems like she's the really impressionable type. While it 
wasn't a bad thing to be enthusiastic about new things, I'd 
probably have to keep a close eye on her.
data.processed:
<story>……It seems like she's the really impressionable type. While it 
<story>wasn't a bad thing to be enthusiastic about new things, I'd 
<story>probably have to keep a close eye on her.
